TEXT.TITLE: MCDONNELL <MD> UNIT SIGNS PACT WITH MARTIN <ML>
TEXT.BODY: Martin Marietta Corp said it signed an exclusive agreement with McDonnell Douglas Corp's Tymnet Co for Tymnet to provide data communications services as a member of its team bidding on the federal government's FTS 2000 telecommunications system. Tymnet is a unit of McDonnell's Information Systems Group. The government's FTS 2000 system will replace the current one operated for federal agencies by the General Services Administration. The GSA issued a request for proposals in January, with responses due in June and selection of a contractor scheduled by year end. Reuter
